# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Xyce.supp ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/Xyce.supp ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/options ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/options ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/valgrind.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/valgrind.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/valgrind.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/valgrind.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/valgrind.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND  VALGRIND_MASTER AND BASH_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VALGRIND/valgrind.cir.sh COMMAND bash valgrind.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} valgrind.cir ${OutputDataDir}/VALGRIND/valgrind.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VALGRIND/valgrind.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;required:valgrindmaster")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VALGRIND/valgrind.cir.sh PROPERTIES TIMEOUT 28800)
endif()
